metadata.name: DANCE STEP
metadata.description:
“criptodancer” is my first NFT collection. Each work is a 1/1 and all are variations of a fictional character “A6O50”. 


"CRIPTODANCER" shows a dystopian scenario in which nature has been digitized and the physical body is trapped in the interface between the virtual and the real. A6O50 is a cyborg that embodies a Latin American dancer caught in the nostalgia of those hot dances among the ruin.

The costume has been made by electronic junk. 


As a dancer and choreographer, I’m interested on explore ways to create performance in the NFT space. Also, I want to investigated the dialog between the body and the digital art scenario.

Created By @criptodancer
2023

music @camilaesmok IG 
performance @criptodancer
